info.name: MyTelUV2 API Collection
info.description: Complete Postman collection for MyTelUV2 backend API - includes Auth, Akademik, Biometrik, and Kendaraan endpoints

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Register a new user. Required fields: nama, username, password. Optional: role (default: MAHASISWA)
Login with username and password. Returns JWT token that will be automatically saved.
Get current user information. Requires authentication token.

query.description: Filter by role: MAHASISWA, DOSEN, or ADMIN
Sort field: createdAt, updatedAt, nama, username, role (default: createdAt)
Sort order: asc or desc (default: desc)

request.description: Get all users with filtering, searching, pagination, and sorting. **Requires ADMIN role**. Returns list of users (password excluded), total count, and pagination metadata. Enable query parameters as needed for filtering.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, and profile retrieval

item.name: Akademik

request.description: Create a new course (matakuliah). Requires ADMIN role.
Get all courses. Requires authentication.
Get a specific course by ID. Requires authentication.
Update a course. Requires ADMIN role.
Delete a course. Requires ADMIN role.

item.name: Kelas

request.description: Create a new class. Requires ADMIN or DOSEN role.
Get all classes. Requires authentication.
Get all classes taught by the authenticated lecturer. Requires DOSEN role.
Get all classes the student is enrolled in. Requires MAHASISWA role.
Get a specific class by ID. Requires authentication.
Update a class. Requires ADMIN or DOSEN role.
Delete a class. Requires ADMIN or DOSEN role.
Get all students enrolled in a class. Requires DOSEN or ADMIN role.
Register for a class. Requires MAHASISWA role.
Drop from a class. Requires MAHASISWA role.

item.description: Endpoints for managing classes and class enrollment

request.description: Open an attendance session for a class. Requires DOSEN or ADMIN role.
Record attendance for a student. Requires MAHASISWA role.
Get my attendance records. Requires authentication.
Get attendance records for a class. Requires DOSEN or ADMIN role.
Get attendance statistics for a class. Requires DOSEN or ADMIN role.

item.description: Academic endpoints for managing courses, classes, and attendance

item.name: Biometrik

formdata.description: User ID to register face for (Required)

request.description: [ADMIN ONLY] Register face biometric data for a specific user. Campus administrators register biometric data, not students themselves. Requires ADMIN role.
[ADMIN ONLY] Delete biometric data for a specific user. Requires ADMIN role.

formdata.description: New face image (jpg, jpeg, or png)

request.description: [ADMIN ONLY] Update biometric face data for a specific user. Upload a new face image. Requires ADMIN role.

formdata.description: Face image to verify (jpg, jpeg, or png)

request.description: Verify a face against all registered biometric data. Used for single person verification (e.g., mobile app). Available to all authenticated users.
Scan and identify multiple faces in an image. Used for batch attendance (e.g., CCTV or classroom camera). Returns all matched users. Available to all authenticated users.

item.description: Biometric face recognition endpoints for adding, updating, verifying, and scanning faces

request.description: Register a vehicle. Requires 3 vehicle photos and 1 STNK photo. Requires authentication.
Get vehicles registered by the authenticated user. Requires authentication.
Get all vehicles registered by the authenticated user. Requires authentication.
Get vehicle registration history for the authenticated user. Requires authentication.
Delete a vehicle registration. Requires authentication.
Get all unverified vehicles. Requires ADMIN role.
Get all vehicles. Requires ADMIN role.
Verify a vehicle registration. Requires ADMIN role.
Reject a vehicle registration with feedback. Requires ADMIN role.
